casebody.data:
No. 10-7887. Robert Simon, Jr., Petitioner v. Christopher B. Epps, Commissioner, Mississippi Department of Corrections. 562 U.S. 1290, 131 S. Ct. 1677,

179 L. Ed. 2d 621,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 2288. March 21, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 394 Fed. Appx. 138.
